aboutPage.description: Rubic 是一个支持多链的 DeFi 生态系统，以成为完整的一站式去中心化平台为目标，提供多个不同区块链间的跨链P2P即时兑换功能。

0.title: Custom routing
0.description: Rubic created a routing solution that will allow users to trade any token. The main advantage is the ability to calculate gas prices and show users the best-optimized solution with paying the least amount of gas.

1.title: Instant Trade
1.description: Execute an instant trade using external DEXs (while getting best rates).

2.title: Multichain support
2.description: Currently supported blockchains: Ethereum, Binance Smart Chain, Polygon & TRON).

3.title: Cross-chain swaps
3.description: Complete swaps between these networks: BSC <-> Ethereum, Polygon <-> Ethereum, Ethereum -> TRON and BSC -> TRON.

4.title: Faucet
4.description: Our Faucet feature will allow users to buy tokens using RBC or ETH without KYC. Currently, users are able to buy BNB, but more to come!

5.title: P2P贸易
5.description: 创建您的贸易，并选择您的利率.

6.title: Limit Order
6.description: Set the desired rate and your deal will be executed automatically when one of the DEXs meets the parameters of your deal.

data.3: Multichain Support: Ethereum, Binance Smart Chain, Polygon & TRON networks

data: Cross-chain Solutions For ETH And BSC
Creating BRBC And Building Rubic Bridge For RBC-BRBC
CoinGecko And Coin Market Cap API For ETH<>RBC
New Wallets support - Wallet Connect + WalletLink (Coinbase)
New Blockchain/Bridge Integrations (Candidates: Anyswap/XDai, HECO, Moonbeam, Fantom, Avalanche, RenBTC)

0.title: What is Rubic?
0.answer:
Rubic is a multichain DeFi ecosystem, which features cross-chain swaps, instant swaps and much more. Our aim is to deliver a complete ONE-STOP decentralized trading platform. The Rubic platform is a place where users can complete cross-chain swaps utilizing different solutions, where users will get the best rates from all the leading swap protocols (thanks to a DEX aggregator implementation), as well as buying MATIC or BNB directly via our Crypto Tap.

At the moment, Rubic supports trades on Ethereum, Polygon (ex Matic), and Binance Smart Chain networks and cross-chain swaps between Ethereum, Polygon (ex Matic), and Binance Smart Chain, xDai and TRON networks.

1.title: Who can use our service?
1.answer: Our service can be used in any part of the world by crypto users who would like to complete trades on different networks and complete cross-chain swaps between them. Our features also include services for other projects: creation of the custom bridges and integration of Rubic Relay widget, which allows users to complete trades directly at service website using Rubic. 	KYC is not required for any operations at Rubic.exchange

2.title: What are the minimum and maximum trade sizes?
2.answer:
There are no limits for Instant Trades.

The minimum and maximum trade sizes for Cross-Chain Swaps will be shown on the form for each token, if they have any restrictions.

3.title: How does it work?
3.answer:
There are numerous features that Rubic provides to its users. These features include:

Instant Trades - Complete a trade between different assets using different blockchains and DEXs, all on one platform.

Rubic Routing system - Complete an instant trade while getting the best rates on the market.

Cross-Chain Swaps - Complete a swap between different networks using integrated and created bridges between those networks.

Crypto Tap - Easily buy MATIC or BNB without ever needing KYC/VPNs, using either RBC or ETH. If RBC is used for the Tap, you’ll also get a discounted rate.

The Rubic platform also provides the services of Custom Bridge creation, platform listings, Rubic Relay Widget integrations and will soon offer cross-chain routing.

The Rubic Relay is a great solution for the problems projects face regarding low user turnover.
It keeps users on your website, transforming trades into a simple action: the Relay offers users and project owners the function of buying and selling tokens on their own project’s webpage, leading users to stay on your website for longer out of sheer utility.
The Relay is also scalable across different devices, and it’s possible to change the colours and size of the Relay widget itself as well.

4.title: Which cryptocurrencies are supported?
4.answer:
At the moment, Rubic allows trading for Ethereum-based tokens (ERC-20),  Binance Smart Chain tokens (BEP-20), and on the Polygon network. For cross-chain swaps Rubic also allows users to transfer their assets between Ethereum, BSC, Polygon, xDai and TRON networks. 
More blockchains will be implemented soon.

At the same time, thanks to our partnership, MyWish users can create and manage tokens. We also provide multichain services supported by Ethereum, Tron, EOS, NEO, and Binance Smart Chain.

5.title: Should I list my token before using your service?
5.answer: No, you can freely trade any token by manually adding their contract addresses. However, you can contact us and we’ll add your token to our list.

6.title: How to start?
6.answer: Using Rubic is quick and simple. You need either a MetaMask crypto wallet, or a wallet that’s compatible with WalletConnect. Choose the blockchain in which you want to swap your tokens, and choose the trade which you’d like to complete. Check out the tutorials on our YouTube channel: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=eo4qZnQbSs8&list=PLVWQUJaU3PTpCzcxPEPNoJOIuVV0Or0FV

7.title: How to create a trade?
7.answer: Instant Trades: Step 1: Select “Swaps”, and choose network in which you would like to complete a swap. Step 2: Fill out the form by choosing the tokens you want to exchange. Step 3: Enter the amount you want to exchange. Step 4: Now, the DEX aggregator will automatically show you the best rates across multiple protocols. Step 5: Press the “Swap” button or Approve your tokens if needed. Step 4: Now, the DEX aggregator will automatically show you the best rates across multiple protocols. Step 6: Use MetaMask or a wallet that’s compatible with WalletConnect, to confirm your trade, and now wait for the transaction to be confirmed on the blockchain. Video tutorial

8.title: How much does it cost?
8.answer:
Currently, our service doesn't charge any provider fees for Instant Trades.

Fees for using the bridges for BRBC and RBC will be:

From RBC (Ethereum) to BRBC (BSC) — 100 RBC (Ethereum).

From BRBC (BSC) to RBC (Ethereum) - 100 BRBC (BSC).
In every trade you need to pay gas fee, you will see the exact amount while confirming the transaction in your wallet.

Rubic’s Tap will help anyone begin using the Polygon and BSC networks, as well as providing a discount for users that complete the swap using the RBC token. Users will be able to swap more BNB and MATIC than normal and pay less RBC at the same time.

Commission fees in ETH is 0.02, and in RBC is just 150 RBC or about 0.007 ETH worth at the current market prices at the time of writing this article.

9.title: How long does it take to complete a transaction?
9.answer:
For Instant Trades, the transaction will be complete as soon as it gets confirmed on the blockchain.

For Cross-chain Swaps, the swap timing depends on the bridge which you’re using to complete the swap.

For Crypto Taps - It will be completed in 5 minutes after the acceptance swap.

10.title: How is the privacy and security of the transaction ensured?
10.answer:
The deal is secured by smart contracts verified by experienced developers and external audits. As a DEX aggregator, we collect several AMM's in our platform that allows users to complete a swap with the best rate.
Rubic team is carefully checking the security of integrated AMM’s and all of the transactions through instant trades are passing through this security reliable projects.

11.title: How do I add the Binance Smart Chain and Polygon networks to MetaMask?
11.answer: Step 1. Click on the top-right circle and head to Settings Step 2. After Settings was accessed, locate and click Networks Step 3. On the top-right cornet click Add Network to manually add Binance Smart Chain (or any other blockchain) Step 4. Add the details written down below for your blockchain of interest Binance Smart Chain Network Network Name: Binance Smart Chain Mainnet New RPC URL: https://bsc-dataseed.binance.org/ ChainID: 56 (*if it’s not working, try 0x38) Symbol: BNB Block Explorer URL: https://bscscan.com Matic Network Network Name: Matic Mainnet New RPC URL: https://rpc-mainnet.matic.network/ ChainID: 137 (*if it’s not working, try 0x89) Symbol: MATIC Block Explorer URL: https://explorer.matic.network Step 5. Click Save and you are ready to go! Remember! Before starting trading, identify your nature of your tokens and select their corresponding Network. To swap between the Networks just click on the top-right on the name of the current Network selected and you’ll get a drop-menu with all the Networks available. Please click here for more details.

12.title: How do I use the ETH <-> BSC bridge?
12.answer: Step 1. Install and unlock MetaMask wallet (www.metamask.io) or use WalletConnect to connect your wallet to www.rubic.exchange. Step 2. Choose your exchange destination (from Ethereum to Binance or vice-versa). You can switch your destination by clicking on the swap arrows button. Step 3. Currently, users are able to swap 25 ERC20 tokens with their corresponding BEP20 version, and vice-versa (the list is always being updated). The list of tokens: USDT to BUSDT-T (Tether) ETH to ETH (Ethereum) BBTC to BTCB (Bitcoin) BBCH to BCH (Bitcoin Cash) BDOT to DOT (Polkadot) BFIL to FIL (Filecoin) SNX to SNX (Synthetix Network Token) DAI to DAI (Dai Stablecoin) BAND to BAND (BandToken) BAT to BATBasic (Attention Token) LINK to LINK (ChainLink) UNI to UNI (Uniswap) YFII to YFII (DFI.Money) YFI to YFI (yearn.finance) BUSD to BUSD (Binance USD) COMP to COMP (Compound) MKR to MKR (Maker) TCT to TCTToken (Club Token) IOTX to IOTX (IoTeX) BEL to BEL (Bella Protocol) ELF to ELF (aelf) PAX to PAX (Paxos Standard) USDC to USDC (USD Coin) INJ to INJ (Injective Protocol) SXP to SX (Swipe) Step 4. Enter the number of tokens you want to swap (check the minimum and maximum amount of tokens that you’re able to exchange). Proceed if you’re satisfied with the amount of returning tokens (this includes the Binance fee). Step 5. You can view tokens' contracts by clicking on 'Check on Etherscan/BSCscan'. Step 6. Click “Swap”, followed by MetaMask's or a wallet that’s compatible with WalletConnect, trade confirmation. Step 7. Please wait until the transaction will be recorded in the blockchain. Once your transaction is accepted you will be notified. You can find the transaction details in the table. Please wait until the Binance will process it as well.

13.title: I'm not able to use cross-chain swaps; it appears I have exceeded their limit. What should I do?
13.answer:
The swap between the Ethereum and Binance Smart Chain networks uses the Panama Bridge, which has some restrictions on swaps. This error might occur if you’re completing the swap from a country that has restricted Binance. Please use a VPN, and refresh the page or try again in 30 mins.

This restriction will soon improve after the implementation of cross-chain routing.

14.title: How long does it take to complete a cross-chain swap?
14.answer:
It usually varies, and this does not depend on us, but on the two blockchains.

 As estimations, we have 2 minutes for initialization, then 4 minutes for feedback waiting, and another couple of minutes for the deposit

15.title: How does Rubic unite different DEX platforms?
15.answer: Users will be able to choose the suitable DEX protocol in order to get the best tokens rates with the lowest gas prices. Rubic always analyzes and compares all the variants, and comes up with the best rate. Please notice that while checking all the alternatives we consider the GAS fee. Rubic strives to provide users with the best exchange opportunities.

16.title: Why do we need to make a choice between different providers?
16.answer:
The gas fees and price rates of these protocols are different, therefore the opportunity of having more options empowers the users to make better trading decisions.

Moreover, Rubic created a routing solution that will allow users to trade any token on BSC, Polygon and Ethereum networks. Our self-created routing system for Ethereum has several advantages over the Uniswap routing system. The main advantage is the ability to calculate gas prices and show users the best-optimized solution while paying the least amount of gas.

Our routing system gives users lower prices on their swaps than most DEXs. Users will receive quotes for lower prices in situations where the price difference between different swap outcomes costs more than the ANTICIPATED price difference for the miner’s commission fees. When this difference in swap price is more than the difference in miner’s commission fees, the user will be presented with an option for a cheaper swap route. In situations where this occurs, users will also be given an option with a more expensive gas fee and a longer route to execute the swap, due to potential issues with liquidity.

17.title:
What should I do when I see the message:
Trading on Uniswap is not available
?
17.answer:
If you get this message, try the following methods:
1. Reload the page.
2. Clear the website cache.
3.  Log out and then log back into MetaMask.

If it’s still not working please contact our support team.

18.title: What should I do if Uniswap doesn’t display the rates?
18.answer: In order to see the Uniswap rates you will need to login with your MetaMask wallet or a wallet that’s compatible with WalletConnect, once logged in refresh the page as well.

19.title: What are use cases of RBC?
19.answer:
The Rubic platform has an ERC-20 token, «RBC», which is used as the fuel within the platform.

 Our platform is chargingthe users for the following operations:

 Rubic Bridge swaps 

 Crypto Tap swaps 

 Bridge creations 

 Order book creation 

 Other services 

 Accounting with Relayers, external services, and marketing services are made in RBC.

20.title: What is the Rubic Relay widget?
20.answer:
The Rubic Relay is a great solution for the problems projects face regarding low user turnover.
It keeps users on your website, transforming trades into a simple action: the Relay offers users and project owners the function of buying and selling tokens on their own project’s webpage, leading users to stay on your website for longer out of sheer utility.
The Relay is also scalable across different devices, and it’s possible to change the colours and size of the Relay widget itself as well.

21.title: How can we integrate the Rubic Relay widget?
21.answer: Here is a detailed instructional guide for the Relay’s integration: https://drive.google.com/file/d/1ULxjzN3sVc2indb5-_PtR7v7jui_tCJ7/view?usp=sharing

22.title: How do we get listed on Rubic?
22.answer:
Please fill out the form at Rubic.exchange in order to get listed.

 If you want your project to be listed on the Rubic platform please send an email to support@rubic.finance with the following information:
Project name
Project description
Links to the project and social media
Contract address
Whitepaper/Onepager

23.title: How do I use Rubic’s bridges?
23.answer: Tutorial for our bridges: Step 1. Install MetaMask wallet (www.metamask.io) or WalletConnect and connect it to Rubic.exchange. Step 2. Choose your exchange destination (from Ethereum to Binance or vice-versa). You can switch your destination by clicking on the swap arrows button. Step 3. Currently, users are able to swap the RBC token with its corresponding BEP20 (BRBC) version, and vice-versa. Step 4. Enter the number of tokens you want to swap (check the minimum and maximum amount of tokens that you’re able to exchange). Proceed if you’re satisfied with the amount of returning tokens (this includes the Rubic bridge). Step 5. You can view token contracts by clicking on 'Check on Etherscan/BSCScan'. Step 6. Click “Swap”, followed by accepting MetaMask’s or a wallet that’s compatible with WalletConnect, trade confirmation. Step 7. Please wait until the transaction is recorded on the blockchain. You’ll be notified once your transaction is accepted, and you can find the transaction details in the MyTrades table. Please wait until the Rubic bridge processes it as well.

24.title: How to use TRON bridge?
24.answer: Step 1. Install and unlock MetaMask wallet (www.metamask.io) or use WalletConnect to connect your wallet to www.rubic.exchange. Step 2. Choose your exchange destination (from Ethereum or Binance Smart Chain to TRON). Step 3. Enter your TRON wallet address in settings. Your tokens will be transferred to it. Step 4. Currently, users can only trade USDT and bUSDT to the corresponding TRON network version. Step 5. Enter the number of tokens you want to swap (check the minimum and maximum amount of tokens that you’re able to exchange). Next, proceed if you are satisfied with the amount of returning tokens (this includes the transaction fee). Step 6. You can view token contracts by clicking on ‘Check on Etherscan/TRONscan’. Step 7. Click Create Swap, followed by accepting MetaMask’s or a wallet that’s compatible with WalletConnect trade confirmation. Step 8. Please wait until the transaction is recorded in the blockchain. You’ll be notified once your transaction is accepted, and you can find the transaction details in the table.

25.title: How do I use the ETH <-> Polygon bridge?
25.answer: On Rubic.exchange, you’re able to swap ERC20 tokens with their corresponding version in the Polygon network and vice-versa (for example, swap USDT- ERC20 with USDT in the Polygon network). Since Ethereum is facing high gas fees and BSC only started adding more validators, people are looking for networks that are more attractive for traders. Users will be able to transfer their tokens onto the Polygon ecosystem, all within the Rubic platform. Polygon has already powered more than 7M transactions for more than 300k user addresses, with transaction activity increasing by the day. Currently, our bridge will only allow users to swap PoS tokens. Swap from Ethereum to Polygon: Step 1. Enter the number of tokens that you want to swap and press “Create Swap.” Step 2. Accept the transaction through your MetaMask or a wallet that’s compatible with WalletConnect. Step 3. Your transaction status will be shown on the table. Step 4. After 7–10 minutes, your cross-chain swap will be completed and you’ll be able to trade your tokens within the Polygon network. Swap from Polygon to Ethereum: Step 1. Enter the number of tokens that you want to swap and press “Create swap.” Step 2. Wait until the “Withdraw in progress” status is changed to “Waiting for deposit”. Your transaction status will be shown on the table. Step 3. Press “Receive.” Step 4. Your tokens will be swapped to your wallet on the Ethereum network as soon as the transaction is mined. In some cases, completing swaps might take more time than usual.

26.title: How do I use the xDai bridge?
26.answer: Step 1. Install and unlock MetaMask wallet (www.metamask.io) or use WalletConnect to connect your wallet to www.rubic.exchange. Step 2. Choose your exchange destination (from Ethereum to xDai). Step 3. Currently, users are able to swap DAI tokens to the xDAI version. Step 4. Enter the number of tokens you want to swap (check the minimum and maximum amount of tokens that you’re able to exchange). Proceed if you’re satisfied with the amount of returning tokens. Step 5. You can view token contracts by clicking on 'Check on Etherscan/Blockscout.’ Step 6. Click “Swap,” followed by accepting your wallet’s trade confirmation. Step 7. Please wait until the transaction is recorded on the blockchain. You’ll be notified once your transaction is accepted, and you can find the transaction details in the table. Please wait until the xDai bridge processes it as well.

instantTrades.slippage: 如果價格的不利變化超過輸入的百分比，您的交易將被取消。 （較低的百分比會降低您的交易被搶先的機會）
instantTrades.multihops: 您的交換將僅通過直接對完成。
instantTrades.rubicOptimisation: 默認情況下啟用 Rubic 優化。 但是，您可以禁用它以便執行最佳貿易路線，而無需考慮 gas 成本。
instantTrades.deadline: 如果待處理的時間超過此時間段，您的交易將恢復。
instantTrades.autoRefresh: 每 15 秒更新一次交易參數。
